description:
mass fraction of dissolved salt material in seawater.
The Reference Composition Salinity S_R can be calculated from the salinity S in PSU (Practical Salinity Unit) using the dimensionless unit Practical Salinity Scale (PSS) as S_R =c·S with c = (35,16504/35) g/kg. For seawater of Reference Composition, S_R   gives the best current estimate of S_A . If composition anomalies are present, S_A can be calculated from the seawater density or estimated from a global mapping of the Absolute Salinity Anomaly dS = S_A - S_R .
